sentences.sentence: You know, because you're a dumbbell, 'and went into hysterics.
sentences.translation: 你知道，因为你自己就是一个哑铃(蠢人)然后她就变得有些歇斯底里起来。

sentences.sentence: This dumbbell-style alarm clock wants to start your day off right!
sentences.translation: 这款哑铃状闹钟让你的一天从健身开始！

sentences.sentence: This shopping bag shows a 10 pound dumbbell (printed on both sides).
sentences.translation: 此购物带在两面都印上了10磅重哑铃。
